archimate:Deliverable.name: Priorization and risk assesment of assets enabled on ServiceNow
archimate:Deliverable.documentation: Prioritization of found risks based on vulnerability and asset value or context. Likelihood of exploitation should also be periodically updated based on the most current threat information. For example, the release of a new exploit, or new intelligence relating to exploitation of the vulnerability, should change the priority through which the vulnerability should be considered for patching.
